Generates price data from the OU process.

Parameters

  • base_price (int, default 1) â€“ The base price to use for price generation.

  • base_volume (int, default 1) â€“ The base volume to use for volume generation.

  • start_date (str, default '2010-01-01') â€“ The start date of the generated data

  • start_date_format (str, default '%Y-%m-%d') â€“ The format for the start date of the generated data.

  • times_to_generate (int, default 1000) â€“ The number of bars to make.

  • time_frame (str, default '1h') â€“ The time frame.

  • params (ModelParameters, optional) â€“ The model parameters.
